body: BRUH I HIT RANDOM AND THIS IS WHAT I GET?

I agree with you @omnimon11 but don't forget, this is hentai, not some normal anime, male hentai characters are not really likeable at most times, some of them treat women like trash but it's hentai afterall, what do you expect
Reading this series only makes me feel sorry for Milt. Even the boy who claims to love her no longer treats her like a person. Stupid little shit won’t even listen to a goddamn word she says.
